data.1: WAS THERE NOT a time in the life of man when he was not even a mentionable thing?
data.2: Verily We created man from a sperm yoked (to the ovum) to bring out his real substance, then gave him hearing and sight.
data.3: We surely showed him the way that he may either be grateful or deny.
data.4: We have prepared for unbelievers chains and collars and a blazing fire.
data.5: Surely the devotees will drink cups flavoured with palm blossoms
data.6: From a spring of which the votaries of God will drink and make it flow in abundance.
data.7: Those who fulfil their vows and fear the Day whose evil shall be diffused far and wide,
data.8: And feed the needy for the love of Him, and the orphans and the captives,
data.9: (Saying): "We feed you for the sake of God, desiring neither recompense nor thanks.
data.10: We fear the dismal day calamitous from our Lord."
data.11: So God will protect them from the evil of that day, and grant them happiness and joy,
data.12: And reward them for their perseverence Paradise and silken robes,
data.13: Where they will recline on couches feeling neither heat of the sun nor intense cold.
data.14: The shadows will bend over them, and low will hang the clusters of grapes.
data.15: Passed round will be silver flagons and goblets made of glass,
data.16: And crystal clear bottles of silver, of which they will determine the measure themselves.
data.17: There will they drink a cup flavoured with ginger
data.18: From a spring by the name of Ever-flowing-Salsabil.
data.19: And boys of everlasting youth will go about attending them. Looking at them you would think that they were pearls dispersed.
data.20: When you look around, you will see delights and great dominion.
data.21: On their bodies will be garments of the finest green silk and brocade, and they will be adorned with bracelets of silver; and their Lord will give them a purest draught to drink.
data.22: "This in truth is your recompense, and acceptance of your endeavours."
data.23: We have revealed the Qur´an to you gradually;
data.24: So wait for your Lord´s command, and do not follow any sinner or disbeliever among them.
data.25: Meditate upon the name of your Lord morning and evening;
data.26: And bow in homage part of the night, and glorify Him far into the night.
data.27: Surely men love what hastes away and forget the grievous day (ahead).
data.28: We created them and fixed their bones and joints; and We could replace them when We like with others like them.
data.29: This surely is a reminder: Therefore whosoever desires may take the way to his Lord.
data.30: But you will not desire except as God wills. Verily He is all-knowing and all-wise.
data.31: He admits whosoever He will to His benevolence. But for the evil-doers He has prepared a painful punishment.
